data.name: SwingStar
data.description:
SwingStar VR allows players to swing around a virtual reality world using a giant sticky hand attached to their head. The game is a third-person swinging physics puzzler that puts players through a wild ride, accelerating the player as they swing. It's wacky and super fun. 

A disaster has mutated physics, you must save your home multiverse by ringing all the mysterious bells. A colossus robot stand between you and the final bell.

- Explore all 30 colorful cartoon levels by swinging through enchanted deserts, bright forests, steep canyons, and many more bizarre and beautiful worlds.
- Epic Boss Battle. 
- Touch Controller supported.
- Unlock mysterious doors that unlock secret levels
- Wacky power up items change the gameplay. Turbo Yo-yos swing you around, Air Cannons blast you high in the air, and The  Grappling Jelly will suck you to it's gooey surface. 
- Brilliantly dreamy soundtrack.
- Get all 84 stars to unlock the mysterious inter-dimensional zone.

changelog.change_log:
- gear vr motion controller support
- stereoscopic turned on
- update tutorial graphics

- Updated background themes (Sky levels, tutorial scenery 
and level 4).  
- Patched a major bug causing some Gear VR phones to crash on startup.
- Updated Zero Eden Logo Screen

The best SwingStar VR patch yet!
- 5 new thrilling levels
- a new power up block type the Cloud Mover 
- We fixed the bug where opening a secret doors would erase stars on that level. 
- We redid the graphics in the canyon levels. 
- The kid also got a new animated helmet hand, so fancy.
- Update the "Awesome" ending animation.
- Fixed bug were the menu would not be clickable through world objects.
- Fix minor frame freeze on first time swing on bell
- Main menu has a cleaner look
- Install file size footprint has been reduced

- Epic Final Boss Battle
- Level star ratings adjusted
- Player can no longer die in free-mode
- Ending Screen

Swing Star, Patch 2
-Added Eight New Levels
-Massive Performance Improvements
-Added a ton of new art and content
-Some levels are now unlocked via secret doors

Updated to Unity 5.3.4p1

FiXED 
Crashing on load
Volume Slider not showing up
Even better performance.

NEW
Background Music
Sound Effects
Toggle for music & sound effect in options
Performance Improvements on all levels hitting 60 fps in most levels
Level adjustments
More tutorial feedback 
Onboarding improved 
Cleaner scene transition 
New exit level warp out effect
New Air Cannon model
New Yoyo behavior

DEBUG TOOL
Unlock all levels in options menu Look UP
